message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.HC 

This paper deals with generating videos of facial expressions using deep learning techniques. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision). The paper also proposes a novel approach using Wasserstein Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) for motion generation, which falls under the category of cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper involves modeling facial landmarks and generating realistic appearance, which can be categorized under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also evaluates the proposed approach on public datasets, which falls under the category of cs.MM (Multimedia). Finally, the paper discusses the potential application of the proposed approach in emotion recognition, which can be categorized under cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction).
